statements: SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status FROM orders WHERE delivery_status = 'Pending';
SELECT order_id, delivery_address FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' AND order_status = 'Processing';
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT order_id, delivery_address FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, delivery_status FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders WHERE delivery_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM orders
SELECT order_id, order_status FROM orders
SELECT customer_id, order_time FROM orders
SELECT order_id, order_status, customer_id FROM orders
SELECT * FROM delivery_info
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, order_status FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT order_id, order_time, customer_id FROM orders ORDER BY order_time DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_status, delivery_address FROM orders JOIN delivery_info ON orders.order_id = delivery_info.order_id;
SELECT order_id, order_time, delivery_status FROM delivery_info WHERE delivery_time > '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM order_status ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT order_id, status FROM order_status WHERE status = 'Delivered';
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_status, delivery_time FROM delivery_information WHERE delivery_status <> 'In Transit';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, current_location FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck';
SELECT * FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, status, timestamp FROM order_status WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT delivery_id, order_id, delivery_status, delivery_time FROM delivery_information WHERE delivery_status = 'In Transit' ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, current_location, last_updated FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE current_location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM order_status INNER JOIN delivery_information ON order_status.order_id = delivery_information.order_id;
SELECT order_id, status, timestamp FROM order_status UNION SELECT delivery_id, delivery_status, delivery_time FROM delivery_information;
SELECT * FROM orders LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number='1234567890';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, delivery_address FROM orders WHERE delivery_status='Pending';
SELECT * FROM deliveries WHERE actual_delivery_time IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_status, delivery_address FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Shipped' ORDER BY order_id ASC;
SELECT delivery_id, order_id, scheduled_delivery_time, actual_delivery_time FROM deliveries WHERE scheduled_delivery_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY scheduled_delivery_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM order_status WHERE order_id = 123
SELECT status, last_update FROM order_status ORDER BY last_update DESC
SELECT order_id, status FROM order_status WHERE status = 'Shipped'
SELECT delivery_id, order_id, delivery_status FROM delivery_info WHERE delivery_date >= '2021-09-15'
SELECT agent_name, phone_number FROM delivery_agents
SELECT * FROM order_status ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT order_id, status FROM order_status WHERE status = 'processing';
SELECT d.agent_name, da.vehicle_type FROM delivery_agents d JOIN delivery_vehicles da ON d.agent_id = da.vehicle_id;
SELECT o.history_id, o.order_id, o.update_time, d.delivery_date FROM order_history o JOIN delivery_info d ON o.order_id = d.order_id WHERE o.status = 'delivered' AND d.delivery_status = 'completed';
SELECT count(order_id) AS total_orders FROM order_status WHERE status = 'processing';
